Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
@kolo I guess under the current airdrop system there isn't a way to stop "Voter and candidate agreements" aka... vote buying.  
I don't know enough about Blockchain coding to even suggest an alternative and I assume someone would have already done so if one were available.
I have already spent about .25 BTC on costs I'll never see back so we will run as hard as we can, but this is not very ideal from any standpoint, and other than "following the code" arguments, I don't see how anyone could agree with the morals of it.
Perhaps this is a dead horse but this is only my first time around.
Thanks for bringing it up.  We will proceed accordingly.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: I assume that it's possible that way, but I don't know enough about coding, and I am not trying to give anyone a bunch of extra work for this just because I don't agree with it.
